our services

gardening services

  • Removing all unwanted grasses from garden

  • Cutting and trimming grasses all over the compoud using grass cutting machines

  • Protecting grasses and flowers from getting dry by watering the garden

  • Cleaning and maintaining the entire environment from dirt

  • Collecting all papers and garbage around the compound

  • Planting grasses and flowers where requried by cutting flowers when they're grown

  • Cleaning all trenches and avoiding blockage

  • Proffessionaly provided services for cleaning parlor chairs and carpets

  • we plant garden and make garden designing

  • we plant all kinds of trees in proffessional way and maintenance

  • we medicine the garden in professional way to fight flowers to be eaten by parasites

  • we wash home chairs, carpets and ceramics by using professional machines

toilet cleaning services

dirt removal

To clean the toilets and remove all unwanted dirty substances from the toilets when they're full in a professional way.

cleaning tools

We supply cleaning materials, that we use when we are cleaning toilets from different places and in a professional way anywhere in daily life.

office workers

We provide office workers who are well trained to provide services in professional way to any company in Rwanda.

about us

Clean care Services ,Ltd, is your trusted service provider for retail, industrial, commercial & residential services. As leading cleaning & garden contractors, we know that not all businesses or homes are the same and therefore we offer tailored cleaning & garden services to meet your exact needs.
